Text.Page:
I can't ignore the danger the basilisks pose any longer. Velika says no one goes in, but Chebika won't be safe until someone does.

You're authorized to enter the Vale of Graves and kill {@LinkCreature:21#2#dusky basilisks}. Report back once you're finished.
Basilisks are nothing to trifle with. I salute your courage, <PCNAME>!
Chebika is under federation protection. I have my orders, as do you. Take out the basilisks.
